entry.title: Sangria in the sun
entry.content:
My toes are stuck in the sand. The sun is swelling. Morning, as always, calm. This, my fellow data hackers, is where it begins.

I’ll put on my shoes in a minute and head in the office. I’ll be back here tonight. I’ll be back here tomorrow.
entry.summary: My toes are stuck in the sand. The sun is swelling. Morning, as always, calm. This, my fellow data hackers, is where it begins.

entry.title: Underneath the code
entry.content: To code is to create and to create is grace. Give me a room and the time to create and I’ll give up my dusty window to the world.
entry.summary: To code is to create and to create is grace. Give me a room and the time to create and I’ll give up my dusty window to the world.
